awesonme

I have mixed feelings with this because on one hand there's nothing quite like Dbd out there, even the clones can't capture what makes this so fun. At the same time Behaviour Interactive Inc. were acting like sussy bakas with the whole NFT controversy/fiasco when Cenobite via the Hellraiser collaboration was added to the game. As well as some questionable balancing and design changes from the devs over the years since the game was released, just see how everyone argues over this regardless of what they main all the time. Plus the bugs, oh all of the bugs. 

Barring all of that this is definitely a good time with friends. However solo queue as a Survivor is a mixed bag and your mileage may vary, think of it as dynamic difficulty depending on your individual skill and MMR bracket. Since I don't really play Killer I can't comment on their side of things, but over the years Killer mains have had their own share of frustrations so.... haha

Overall Dbd is a fun way to hangout with friends if you're a casual, solo play experience can vary wildly from person to person.

Apesar disso tudo o jogo é maravilhoso e muito divertido, vale a pena 100%.

Me decidí a comprar el juego después de probarlo durante dos findes que lo pusieron gratis en Steam. 

La idea del juego está genial pero prefieren sacar DLCs nuevos en lugar de arreglar los bugs: la hitbox del juego es falsísima, le das a los palets y no bajan o saltas una ventana y te dan desde Narnia... De cada vez se estila más facecampear a los supervivientes y no se puede ni jugar :)

Muy chulo para jugar solo o con amigos, pero hay que lidiar con esto.

Gioco in cui in ogni aggiornamento escono nuovi bug, nuovi glitch e le meccaniche di gioco si rompono e ti parte lo sclero.
Pecca non di poco conto è la comunità super tossica.
Il gioco ha costanti bilanciamenti e patch, anche se adesso (viste le varie lamentele) pende un po lato killer.
Lo consiglio solo per passare del tempo con amici, altrimenti finirete nelle mani del tossico di turno che vi bullizzerà per tutta la partita

I got this recommended by a meaty buddy, it's fun , a high learning curve but can be frustrating at times while your learn the counters, killers , tricks etc. 

CONS
- game is pretty much forcing you to buy DLC's , the free currency is very slow to grind , when you got some shards its usually more reasonable to buy a rare perk in the shrine then save for a new killer/survivor  .
- from what i heard there is never a discount on the free currency when buying killer/survivor, just the paid currency.

Still worth buying it on a discount , try it and get few mates.
good game, lots of fun, BUT the time it takes to get a game group together is WAY to long

I do not recommend this game only because this game heavily relies on an online community, and in every chance I tried matchmaking with other players, it took at least 20 minutes. I never got to play as a Hunter because, I would assume, most people want to play as the Hunter instead of the Hunted. I waited even longer as a Hunter and eventually gave up.

The game costs too much to ultimately wait that amount of time. You could call me impatient, but I want to be able to play something without waiting forever between matches.

Играть весело,только если есть друзья. Одному получать удовольствие от игры сложно,особенно после 300+ часов игры. А про ранговую систем я вообще молчу,работает она криво. Новичку вполне могут попасться игроки с тремя тысячами часов и они обассут его. И еще я ненавижу эту игру за то что не смотря на всю ненависть к ней я играю в нее с друзьями,побеждаю и проигрываю.

Despite some issues, I love this game. It was the first of its kind, and still gives me the chills. Especially when new killers come out! I love the game, though the community has its moments. 

If you're looking for a game to play with some friends, or to give you a small spook, this is definitely worth it. 
If you want it but cannot afford the price, I do recommend waiting for Steam Sales, though!

Its a cool game. It has a lot of killers and survivors.

Идея игры очень интересная, но игра багованая, и багов даже за 3 года меньше не становится.

Это одна из тех игр, где баги растут в арифметической прогрессии. Починили 3 бага, сделали 4, починили 4, сделали 5. Починили 5, но сделали 3 новых критических бага.

В этой игре поиск игры легко может длиться больше чем сама игра.
Например, ищешь игру 10 минут, играешь 5. А может кто-то вылететь из-за багов, игра отменяется, и опять по новой искать 10 минут. Может быть такое, что ты ищешь игру 10 минут, а лобби просто не загружается. Игру приходится снимать через диспетчер задач.

То есть в этой игре легко можно потратить 1 час не сыграв ни разу, просто пытаясь найти игру.

Нужно оно вам или нет, решайте.
Не тратьте ни денег, ни времени на эту хуйню

While it is a fun game, it has currently found itself in a recession due to many forces acting upon it, the biggest one being the developers.

I choose to now, like many others, refuse to give any more money to the company. The choices Behavior have made has been only for the betterment of themselves. They prove that they are aware of the pleas for people who played this game far longer than I have and will NOT do anything about it. 

Repeated bugs occurring, a current Tsunami of hackers, and exploits that easily dodge their thousands of lines of useless spaghetti code has started to put a sour taste in my mouth for this game as well.

I cannot wait to find myself playing VHS when it comes out, cause that game looked promising after watching the GAME DEVELOPERS beta test their game to an audience and ACTUALLY play it well.
